text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1a577433ac77b74a965476799619ad0fb2676d31|patch 8.1.2239: CI fails when running tests without building Vim>
patch 8.1.2239: CI fails when running tests without building Vim

Problem:    CI fails when running tests without building Vim.
Solution:   Skip creating doc tags if the execute does not exist.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2239: CI fails when running tests without building Vim · vim/vim@1a57743
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2239: CI fails when running tests without building Vim · vim/vim@1a57743
attachments.text: Problem: CI fails when running tests without building Vim. Solution: Skip creating doc tags if the execute does not exist.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f2885d3fb7045d14ae58824e9cb8dea65e4052c4|patch 8.1.2240: popup window width changes when scrolling>
patch 8.1.2240: popup window width changes when scrolling

Problem:    Popup window width changes when scrolling.
Solution:   Also adjust maxwidth when applying minwidth and there is a
            scrollbar.  Fix off-by-one error. (closes #5162)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2240: popup window width changes when scrolling · vim/vim@f2885d3
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2240: popup window width changes when scrolling · vim/vim@f2885d3
attachments.text: Problem: Popup window width changes when scrolling. Solution: Also adjust maxwidth when applying minwidth and there is a scrollbar. Fix off-by-one error. (closes #5162)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/024dbd229fa7991b7bf7ef4d0888b43ab03783f7|patch 8.1.2241: match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor'>
patch 8.1.2241: match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor'

Problem:    Match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor'.
Solution:   Apply 'wincolor' last on top of any other attribute. (closes #5159)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2241: match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor' · vim/vim@024dbd2
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2241: match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor' · vim/vim@024dbd2
attachments.text: Problem: Match highlight does not combine with 'wincolor'. Solution: Apply 'wincolor' last on top of any other attribute. (closes #5159)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/70def98a957620cc325d1ab6ee35f13187598693|patch 8.1.2242: creating docs tags uses user preferences>
patch 8.1.2242: creating docs tags uses user preferences

Problem:    Creating docs tags uses user preferences. (Tony Mechelynck)
Solution:   Add "--clean".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2242: creating docs tags uses user preferences · vim/vim@70def98
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2242: creating docs tags uses user preferences · vim/vim@70def98
attachments.text: Problem: Creating docs tags uses user preferences. (Tony Mechelynck) Solution: Add "--clean".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/32aa10203bd0b4b270def03311a4599f9ffdecc4|patch 8.1.2243: typos in comments>
patch 8.1.2243: typos in comments

Problem:    Typos in comments.
Solution:   Fix the typos. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5160)  Also adjust
            formatting a bit.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2243: typos in comments · vim/vim@32aa102
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2243: typos in comments · vim/vim@32aa102
attachments.text: Problem: Typos in comments. Solution: Fix the typos. (Dominique Pelle, closes #5160) Also adjust formatting a bit.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/82cf7f6df751505da285815a791463a049587849|patch 8.1.2244: 'wrapscan' is not used for "gn">
patch 8.1.2244: 'wrapscan' is not used for "gn"

Problem:    'wrapscan' is not used for "gn".
Solution:   Only reset 'wrapscan' for the first search round. (closes #5164)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2244: 'wrapscan' is not used for "gn" · vim/vim@82cf7f6
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2244: 'wrapscan' is not used for "gn" · vim/vim@82cf7f6
attachments.text: Problem: 'wrapscan' is not used for "gn". Solution: Only reset 'wrapscan' for the first search round. (closes #5164)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2f7b7b1e123d505637d21e0df28eb9e92667479c|patch 8.1.2245: third character of 'listchars' tab shows in wrong place>
patch 8.1.2245: third character of 'listchars' tab shows in wrong place

Problem:    Third character of 'listchars' tab shows in wrong place when
            'breakindent' is set.
Solution:   Set c_final to NUL. (Naruhiko Nishino, closes #5165)
